html:
Computing for Hospitality 1

Throughout this module, students will be taught using some core function of excel to design key documents commonly used in the hospitality industry. Students will be able to automate some key task, and produce templates allowing significant gain of time and efficiency. With a strong focus on problem solving, the module will also enable students to apply the competencies gained to design other templates when joining the industry.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Use conditional formatting.

+  Use pivot table./p>

+  Use key formula for calculating sum, average, percentage etc.

+  Design a fully functional Cashiering report, Stock inventory form, and food costing).

Module Content:
